title: Dollar Weakness Spurs Yen Gains, Gold Hits $5,000: Markets Wrap
description: The dollar weakened, spurring a jump in the yen, and US equity-index futures dropped amid concerns the US may assist Japan in currency intervention. Gold rose above $5,000 for the first time.
content: The dollar weakened, spurring a jump in the yen, and US equity-index futures dropped amid concerns the US may assist Japan in currency intervention. Gold rose above $5,000 for the first time.
